short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: this extension can reporting bug to Azure Devops

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
an extension that captures bugs from your page and reports them to azure devops as bugs. 
You can create different media attachments such as screenshots or video HAR Capture
